revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: A Treatise on the Scurvy. In Three Parts. Containing An Inquiry into the Nature, Causes, and Cure, of that Disease. Together with A Critical and Chronological View..."
revision.text: Possibly: A Treatise on the Scurvy. In Three Parts. Containing An Inquiry into the Nature, Causes, and Cure, of that Disease. Together with A Critical and Chronological View of what has been published on the Subject. By James Lind, M. D. Fellow of the Royal College of Physicians in Edinburgh. (London : Printed for A. Millar in the Strand, MDCCLVII. [1757]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2506269~S1
